catList: Product management refers to the conceptualisation, design, improvement, development,introduction and management of products and services,physically and virtually over their life cycles, by taking into account the culture, consumption patterns, preferences, buying power, and habits of potential customers in light of company objective and strategies. It involves a process that integrates the innovative and productive capabilities of the firm into its products and services (bundles of value embedded into its brands, quality, delivery of customer services, etc.) that are desired in its markets of interest to create and sustain a competitive advantage by adapting to evolving market trends and challenges, such as technological advancements, one-to-one and on-line marketing, and global marketing.
